org.lenskit

Class LenskitRecommenderEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.LenskitRecommenderEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecommenderEngine

    public final class LenskitRecommenderEngine
extends Object
implements RecommenderEngine

    LensKit implementation of a recommender engine. It uses containers set up by the LenskitConfiguration to set up actual recommenders, and can build multiple recommenders from the same model.

    If you just want to quick create a recommender for evaluation or testing, consider using LenskitRecommender.build(LenskitConfiguration). For more control, use LenskitRecommenderEngineBuilder; to load a pre-built recommender engine, use LenskitRecommenderEngineLoader.

    See Also:
    LenskitConfiguration, LenskitRecommender, LenskitRecommenderEngineBuilder, LenskitRecommenderEngineLoader
    Compatibility
    Public

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public static LenskitRecommenderEngine load(File file)
                                     throws IOException,
                                            RecommenderConfigurationException

        Create a new recommender engine by reading a previously serialized engine from the given file. The new engine will be identical to the old except it will use the new DAOFactory. It is assumed that the file was created by using write(OutputStream). Classes will be loaded using a default class loader.

        Parameters:
        file - The file from which to load the engine.
        Returns:
        The loaded recommender engine.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is an error reading from the file.
        RecommenderConfigurationException - If the configuration cannot be used.

      • load

        @Deprecated
public static LenskitRecommenderEngine load(File file,
                                                         ClassLoader loader)
                                                  throws IOException,
                                                         RecommenderConfigurationException
        Deprecated. Use LenskitRecommenderEngineLoader for sophisticated loading.

        Create a new recommender engine by reading a previously serialized engine from the given file. The new engine will be identical to the old except it will use the new DAOFactory. It is assumed that the file was created by using write(OutputStream).

        Parameters:
        file - The file from which to load the engine.
        loader - The class loader to load from (null to use a default class loader).
        Returns:
        The loaded recommender engine.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is an error reading from the file.
        RecommenderConfigurationException - If the configuration cannot be used.

      • load

        public static LenskitRecommenderEngine load(InputStream input)
                                     throws IOException,
                                            RecommenderConfigurationException

        Create a new recommender engine by reading a previously serialized engine from the given input stream. The new engine will be identical to the old. It is assumed that the file was created by using write(OutputStream). Classes will be loaded using a default class loader.

        Parameters:
        input - The stream from which to load the engine.
        Returns:
        The loaded recommender engine.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is an error reading from the file.
        RecommenderConfigurationException - If the configuration cannot be used.

      • write

        public void write(@Nonnull
                  File file)
           throws IOException

        Write the state of this recommender engine to the given file so that it can be recreated later using another DAOFactory. This uses default object serialization so if the factory has a PicoContainer or session bindings containing non-serializable types, this will fail.

        Parameters:
        file - The file to write the rec engine to.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error serializing the engine.
        See Also:
        write(OutputStream)

      • write

        public void write(@Nonnull
                  File file,
                  CompressionMode compressed)
           throws IOException

        Write the state of this recommender engine to the given file so that it can be recreated later using another DAOFactory. This uses default object serialization so if the factory has a PicoContainer or session bindings containing non-serializable types, this will fail.

        Parameters:
        file - The file to write the rec engine to.
        compressed - Whether to compress the output file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error serializing the engine.
        See Also:
        write(OutputStream)

      • write

        public void write(@Nonnull @WillClose
                  OutputStream stream)
           throws IOException

        Write the state of this recommender engine to the given stream so that it can be recreated later using another DAOFactory. This uses default object serialization so if the factory has session bindings containing non-serializable types, this will fail.

        Parameters:
        stream - The file to write the rec engine to.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error serializing the engine.
        See Also:
        load(InputStream)

      • createRecommender

        public LenskitRecommender createRecommender(LenskitConfiguration config)
                                     throws RecommenderConfigurationException

        Construct a recommender with some additional configuration. This can be used to do things like add data source configuration on a per-recommender, rather than per-engine, basis.

        This method is only used for special cases needing detailed access to the recommender.

        Parameters:
        config - The configuration to adjust the recommender.
        Returns:
        The constructed recommender.
        Throws:
        RecommenderConfigurationException - if there is an error configuring the recommender.

                                     throws RecommenderBuildException

        Returns:

      • isInstantiable

        public boolean isInstantiable()

        Query whether this engine is instantiable. Instantiable recommenders have all their placeholders removed and are ready to instantiate.

        Returns:
        true if the recommender is instantiable.

      • getGraph

        @Nonnull
public DAGNode<Component,Dependency> getGraph()

        Get the dependency graph of the recommender engine.

        Returns:
        The dependency graph.

      • getComponent

        @Nullable
public <T> T getComponent(Class<T> type)

        Get the component of a particular type, if one is already instantiated. This is useful to extract pre-built models from serialized recommender engines, for example.

        Parameters:
        type - The required component type.
        T - The required component type.
        Returns:
        The component instance, or null if no instance can be retreived (either because no such component is configured, or it is not yet instantiated).

      • build

        public static LenskitRecommenderEngine build(LenskitConfiguration config)
                                      throws RecommenderBuildException

        Build a LensKit recommender engine from a configuration. The resulting recommender is independent of any subsequent modifications to the configuration.

        Parameters:
        config - The configuration.
        Returns:
        The recommender engine.
        Throws:
        RecommenderBuildException
